rows.label: bf06040100_0010
rows.name: What's the deal with this ceasefire?

rows.label: bf06040100_0020
rows.name:
A tribunal, it looks like.
His Holiness Marveni is here in person.

rows.label: bf06040100_0030
rows.name: It's not like you can just ignore him, yeah?

rows.label: bf06040100_0040
rows.name: Does he have any clue how many men we lost...?!

rows.label: bf06040100_0045
rows.name:
If those Superbians get away with this...
Shit!

rows.label: bf06040100_0050
rows.name:
Quit yer grumblin', mate. All this is way
beyond our pay grade.

rows.label: bf06040100_0060
rows.name:
You got that right. We're all just faceless cannon fodder to the
bigwigs. CO says jump, we jump.
